author: fabiocos
body:
As agreed with @tommasoboccali @klute @peruzzim @fgolf for the management of NanoAOD related packages a separate category "xpog" is added, and the "analysis" category is left without managers (as it is in reality). NanoAOD related packages are also kept inside the analysis category (although a category at present without a manager).

@slava77 @perrotta FYI
title: Clean the list of analysis category managers, add the xpog category for NanoAOD code only
